text: Snoonu is a Qatari startup.

We are providing food delivery
business marketplace,
and our main goal is

to be the first unicorn
company in the Qatar region.

We are going to launch
a lot of new services
inside the Snoonu application
and we are also going for

international expansion.
Using Amazon Bedrock help us
to launch one of our new services.
It's a marketplace because
before we had about a million
of products not categorized at all.
We utilized Amazon Bedrock to help us
categorize all these products

and across we now have
around 1 million products
and 200 categories.

If we are doing it in a
manual way, it can take up
to two man-years of work.

But we did it for around a
month with the Bedrock,
with power of AI
and we are continuing improving
it on a monthly basis

with the help of internal
teams of AWS. Amazon allows us

as a startup to switch from
a very basic deployment
during the scale stage of the startup.

It's really very easy to
switch from virtual machines

to ECS after to the
EKS Kubernetes services,
and we are actually doing this.
We are always changing our infrastructure
to use more top solutions
for actually scaling business.
As a continuation,
Aurora as a serverless scale database,

and we can migrate without any
disruption in our business.
One of our next projects is

to generate a proper user
friendly description.

We now have fully detailed
description for all products.

We trust that building
services on AWS help us

to empower our customer
needs today, tomorrow,
and in 10 years.
